A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No movie will please everyone. I am an original trilogy fan\, but these movies are about the new heroes. That being said\, Luke Skywalker FTW. The sub-plot with Finn and Rose took up some screen time\, but I think that was trying to show us some things that set up the end. A great movie\, and in my opinion\, easy top 3 of all the movies!
